comment._content: Harvard 'Varsity Eight (Crew) – 1913 (standing L-R) Charles T. Abeles, Captain, Coxswain, '13; L.S. Chanler, Stroke, '14; G.T. Stratton, '13; Alfred Montgomery Goodale, '13; G.M. McVicar, '15; B. Harwood, '15; E.D. Morgan, '13; T.H. Trumbell, '14; Q. Reynolds, Bow, '14. –University Archives
